org.forgerock.opendj.server.embedded

Class ReplicationParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.server.embedded.ReplicationParameters

  • public final class ReplicationParameters
extends Object
    Parameters for replication operations on a directory server.

      • replicationPortSource

        public ReplicationParameters replicationPortSource(int port)
        Sets the replication port of the first server (source) whose contents will be replicated.

        The source server should correspond to the embedded server on which the replication operation is applied.

        Parameters:
        port - the replication port
        Returns:
        this builder
